channel.title: Cannot equip anything at all!
channel.description: i recently successfully added a special handler using this tut: [url=http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-317-making-special-attack-269808/]http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-317-making-special-attack-269808/[/url] and the already equipped dds works but then i tryed equipping other items and nothing would equip, any ideas?

item.title: Cannot equip anything at all!

item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

no, that just makes it so it will put an item there when there is not an item already there. above it you can see, it says


        if (oldAmount == 0) {

just read it carfully. and you can find it.

item.title: Cannot equip anything at all!
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

tyvm wut would be the name of it? do u know?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2009, 07:01:39 pm[/size][hr]would this be it? among the others included in this void?

[code]
public void ReplaceItems(int newID, int oldID, int newAmount, int oldAmount) {
for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
if (playerItems[i] == oldID + 1 && oldAmount > 0) {
playerItems[i] = 0;
oldAmount–;
resetItems(3214);
}
}
if (oldAmount == 0) {
addItem(newID, newAmount);
}
}
